tool_description: Compares warranty terms, coverage, and value across different bathroom fixture products and manufacturers.

product_ids.description: List of product IDs to compare warranties for

error_messages: Insufficient products: At least 2 products are required for warranty comparison
Warranty information unavailable: Some products may not have complete warranty details
Invalid product ID: One or more product IDs are not recognized
usage: Provide an array of product_ids to compare their warranty terms, duration, and coverage details.

warranty_years.description: Array of warranty duration in years for each product

coverage_types.description: Array of warranty coverage descriptions for each product

transferable.description: Array indicating if warranty is transferable to new owners

warranty_ratings.description: Array of warranty quality ratings from 1-10 for each product

best_warranty.description: Product ID with the best overall warranty terms
